Subject: Sam, are you there? Date: 19 Apr 1993 00:35 EST Lines: 9 Distribution: na News-Software: VAX/VMS VNEWS 1.41
To Mr. Millitello -
Listen, Sammy, can you explain why Buck pitched you in relief yesterday? I figure no-one would know this better than you yourself.
Jason A. Miller "some doctor guy"
P.S. Tell Bam-Bam he should've made good on his thread to retire :-)
